## every() function

如果 Iterable/AsyncIterable 中的所有值都通过 `f` 真值测试,则返回 true。

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function every<A extends readonly []>(f: Arrow, iterable: A): true;
```

## Example

```ts
every((a) => a % 2 === 0, [2, 4, 6, 8, 10]);
// true

every((a) => a % 2 === 0, [2, 4, 6, 7, 10]);
// false
```

[Try It](https://codesandbox.io/s/fxts-every-g91dh)

[Open Source Code](https://github.com/marpple/FxTS/blob/main/src/every.ts)
